snippet.title: Magicka: Wizards of the Square Tablet - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy the game here: http://bit.ly/Y8rDmh

Magicka: Wizards of the Square Tablet is now available for iPad and Android tablets and features the creative spellcasting gameplay that Magicka fans have come to love, alongside an all-new story and graphics.

In bulletpoint form, the game includes:

• Spellbinding Spellcasting: Combine elements to create thousands of spell combinations
• Play with "friends": 4-player co-op mayhem with many "accidental" team-kills
• Original Story: All-new campaign for single or multiplayer
• Sizzling Tablet-on-Tablet Action: Cross-platform co-op between iOS and Android
• Fat Loot on Thin Screens: New items and powers unique to both iOS and Android
• Semi-appropriate Humor: Spend hours touching a representation of yourself
